Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication.

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children.

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms.

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer.

programme.title: Osama
programme.desc: The first major motion picture to emerge from Afghanistan following the fall of the repressive Taliban regime is the story of a young girl (Marina Golbahari) struggling to survive in the early days of the Taliban's patriarchal rule by disguising herself as a boy. Siddiq Barmak's powerful drama won the Golden Globe for Best Foreign Language Film and an honorable mention at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Time At The Top
programme.desc: 14-year old Susan Shawson travels back in time in her building's elevator. Altered by a retired physicist living in her building, it transports her from Philadelphia in 1998 to the same place in 1881. There she meets Victoria Walker, a girl her own age in need of assistance with her own family problems. Gradually discovering the power of her time machine, Susan, Victoria, and her young brother Robert travel back and forth in time and succeed in changing both the past and the future.

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons.

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy

Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world.(n)

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues.(n)

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder.(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later.(n)

programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister.(n)

programme.title: Miracle
programme.desc: Kurt Russell plays determined United States ice hockey coach Herb Brooks, who has the impossible dream of beating the seemingly unbeatable Soviet Union the 1980 Winter Olympics. Starting with a handpicked group of 26 undisciplined kids, Brooks coaches them to play like they've never played before, and turns 20 of them into a team that believes they could achieve the unachievable. Based on the true story.(n)

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17.(n)

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.(n)

programme.title: Return To Me
programme.desc: After he suffers the devastating loss of his beloved wife Elizabeth, a Chicago building contractor (David Duchovny) unknowingly falls in love with the woman (Minnie Driver) who received Elizabeth's transplanted heart. Carroll O'Connor, James Belushi, Robert Loggia, Joely Richardson, David Alan Grier and Bonnie Hunt (who also wrote and directed) costar in this charming romantic comedy-drama.(n)

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: As an idealistic college professor (Robert Redford) attempts to ignite the spark of genius he sees in a lazy, privileged student, two of his former pupils fight for their lives behind enemy lines in Afghanistan, and a slick congressman (Tom Cruise) attempts to sell a skeptical journalist (Meryl Streep) on his new plans for the ongoing War on Terror. Michael Pena and Derek Luke costar with Andrew Garfield in this topical, provocative drama, directed by Redford.

programme.title: Viking Pride
programme.desc: Trying to get her family out of the country, Nancy is visited by several faces from her past, while Silas deals with the possibility that Lars might be his father, Warren becomes unhinged, and Doug must find his own means of obtaining a fake passport.

programme.title: Fran Tarkenton
programme.desc: Nancy has a tense conversation with Vaughn while the rest of the family scrambles to get passports for Europe and Doug takes a risk by returning to Agrestic for paperwork.

programme.title: My First Mister
programme.desc: Jennifer (Leelee Sobieski) is a 17-year-old Goth with multiple face-piercings and a fondness for graveyards. Randall (Albert Brooks) is a middle-aged salesman with an obsessively tidy life and a fear of anything new. Desperate to escape her world, Jennifer impulsively applies for a job at Randall's conservative clothing store. Soon, an unlikely friendship blooms. But even as Randall attempts to show Jennifer the possibilities of her own future, Jennifer discovers the extraordinary secret haunting Randall's past.

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Criminals Willie (Tony Cox) and Marcus (Billy Bob Thornton) disguise themselves as Santa Claus and his elf and travel across the country to major malls, using the good will people have toward Santa to rob the stores blind. However, Willie can't stand kids and it's all he can do to keep himself from getting fired while on the job. Their plan progresses beautifully until the two meet an introverted 8-year-old boy who thinks Willie is the real Santa Claus, and strikes real sympathy in him.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.

programme.title: Lions for Lambs
programme.desc: As an idealistic college professor (Robert Redford) attempts to ignite the spark of genius he sees in a lazy, privileged student, two of his former pupils fight for their lives behind enemy lines in Afghanistan, and a slick congressman (Tom Cruise) attempts to sell a skeptical journalist (Meryl Streep) on his new plans for the ongoing War on Terror. Michael Pena and Derek Luke costar with Andrew Garfield in this topical, provocative drama, directed by Redford.

programme.title: Lost Cat Corona
programme.desc: Dominic likes to play it safe, but Dom's M.O. is tested when his wife's cat goes missing and he sets out on a quest to find him. Over the course of one day, Dom endures neighborhood mayhem at every turn. He meets a deranged psychopath, endures a sideshow of a wake, and becomes unwittingly involved in the exchange of illegal knockoff handbags. As the day nears the end, a confrontation with a pair of badass teens forces Dom to face the issues that have been holding him hostage his entire life.

programme.title: Alone in Berlin
programme.desc: Otto and Anna Quangel (Brendan Gleeson & Emma Thompson) are a working-class husband and wife doing their best to ride out the war in Berlin in 1940. When their son is killed fighting on the frontlines however, everything changes. They begin pouring their rage and grief into postcards emblazoned with anti-Nazi slogans, risking everything to get their messages of protest across the city. This seemingly small act of subversion rattles the regime, including a police inspector (Daniel Brühl) who will not rest until the culprits have been caught.

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: When a train carrying atomic warheads mysteriously crashes in the former Soviet Union, brilliant U.S. nuclear specialist Dr. Julia Kelly (Nicole Kidman) discovers the accident is really part of a diabolical plot to cover up the theft of the weapons. Assigned to help her recover the missing bombs, Special Forces Colonel Thomas Devoe (George Clooney), has a brash, take-no-prisoners style that clashes with Kelly's diplomatic approach. Putting aside their personal differences, the two begin a partnership and try to track down the stolen weapons.

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world.

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar.

programme.title: Last Weekend
programme.desc: Celia (Patricia Clarkson) is an aging matriarch who wants everyone to gather one last time at her family's gorgeous Lake Tahoe manor and reminisce before she puts it on the market. However, her sons are too preoccupied with their own busy lives and struggling relationships for any nostalgia. The dream of a splendid Labor Day weekend dies quickly in a whirlwind of contention, crisis and family dysfunction. Celia is forced to let go of her fantasy and attend to the harsh reality brought on by a sudden emergency.

programme.title: Certain Women
programme.desc: Michelle Williams, Kristen Stewart and Laura Dern star as three women striving to forge their own paths amidst the wide-open plains of the American Northwest. The lawyer (Dern) finds herself contending with both office sexism and a hostage situation. The wife and mother (Williams) has determination to build her dream home which puts her at odds with the men in her life. The young law student (Stewart) forms an ambiguous bond with a lonely ranch hand (Lily Gladstone).

programme.title: Alone in Berlin
programme.desc: Otto and Anna Quangel (Brendan Gleeson & Emma Thompson) are a working-class husband and wife doing their best to ride out the war in Berlin in 1940. When their son is killed fighting on the frontlines however, everything changes. They begin pouring their rage and grief into postcards emblazoned with anti-Nazi slogans, risking everything to get their messages of protest across the city. This seemingly small act of subversion rattles the regime, including a police inspector (Daniel Brühl) who will not rest until the culprits have been caught.

programme.title: Theoretical Love Is Not Dead
programme.desc: In the Season 6 finale, Nancy faces difficult choices when the Botwins head for the airport and their escape from the country, where Andy attempts to calm the nerves of Shane and Warren, while Silas considers staying behind with Lars.(c)

programme.title: Bags
programme.desc: In the Season 7 premiere, after three years in prison, Nancy receives an early parole to a New York halfway house and discovers her promised witness protection services are no longer necessary; Silas, Shane, Andy and Doug have settled into their new lives in Copenhagen.(c)

programme.title: Palm Swings
programme.desc: Married couple Allison and Mark Hughes moving into their new Palm Springs home. Claire and Jim Ericson are their charismatic new neighbors. Claire, a sensual ex-model, and Jim, a music producer, embody the passionate marriage that Allison wants. Unable to sleep one night, Allison spies with her camera a woman arriving to meet Jim next door. Allison investigates and discovers their neighbors are swingers. Her and Mark get more than they bargained for when their wild adventures threaten to destroy their marriage.

programme.title: Certain Women
programme.desc: Michelle Williams, Kristen Stewart and Laura Dern star as three women striving to forge their own paths amidst the wide-open plains of the American Northwest. The lawyer (Dern) finds herself contending with both office sexism and a hostage situation. The wife and mother (Williams) has determination to build her dream home which puts her at odds with the men in her life. The young law student (Stewart) forms an ambiguous bond with a lonely ranch hand (Lily Gladstone).

programme.title: TIFFANY HADDISH: SHE READY! From the Hood to Hollywood!
programme.desc: In this hour-long special filmed at the Nate Holden Performing Arts Center, rising comedy star Tiffany Haddish takes the stage in her hometown of Los Angeles to tackle subjects ranging from her early days in foster care and being bullied on the playground, to getting her revenge on ex-boyfriends and introducing Will and Jada Pinkett Smith to Groupon.

programme.title: Prophet's Prey
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the shocking life of notorious cult leader Warren Jeffs, and the FLDS Church, who through brainwashing and abuse seized control of his followers' lives and an organization worth hundreds of millions of dollars. While Jeffs is currently serving a life sentence for his crimes, he still exerts total authority over his flock. Features unprecedented interviews with Church insiders and victims, exposing the nightmarish hell of unspeakable crimes that still continue to this day.

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama.

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.

programme.title: Claire in Motion
programme.desc: Three weeks after Claire's husband mysteriously disappears, the police end their investigation. Claire doesn't give up, and soon discovers his troubling secrets, including a graduate student with whom he had formed a close bond. As she digs deeper, Claire begins to lose her grip on how well she truly knew her husband and questions her own identity in the process.

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers).

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack in this sci-fi action thriller directed by Chris Gorak. Starring Emile Hirsch and Oliva Thirlby.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought.

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum).

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out").

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.(n)

programme.title: From Trauma Cometh Something
programme.desc: Struggling to create a new life for herself in New York, Nancy is thrown for a loop when Andy and Shane show up on her doorstep; Silas seeks to launch a state side modeling career; Doug looks up an old friend.(n)

programme.title: Game-Played
programme.desc: Her sister Jill drops an unexpected bombshell on Nancy; Andy and Shane find a place to live; Doug is offered his dream job on Wall Street; Silas scores a modeling gig.(n)

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy.(n)

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Kathy (Academy Award® winner Rachel Weisz) is an American police officer who takes a job working as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia. Her expectations of helping to rebuild a devastated country are dashed when she uncovers a dangerous reality of corruption, cover-up and intrigue, amid a world of private contractors and multinational diplomatic doubletalk. Directed by Larysa Kondracki, the film also stars Academy Award® winner Vanessa Redgrave, Monica Bellucci and Academy Award® nominee David Strathairn.(n)

programme.title: Killshot
programme.desc: An innocent couple that crosses paths with a professional assassin is forced into the witness protection program while the resourceful killer hunts them down in this crime thriller starring Diane Lane, Mickey Rourke and Thomas Jane.(n)

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley.(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis.(n)

programme.title: Burke & Hare
programme.desc: A pair of financially strapped, 19th century Irishmen (Simon Pegg and Andy Serkis) discover a lucrative if gruesome source of income when they begin providing corpses for medical experiments to a well-regarded Edinburgh doctor. Their newly filled coffers and the expensive attentions of their romantic interests, however, soon pressure them to continue and even enhance the cadaver procurement process. Isla Fisher costars in this dark period comedy.(n)

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself.(n)

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as Rob Gordon, the owner of a failing record store located on one of the back streets of Chicago. He employs two wacky clerks, the rock snob Barry (Jack Black) and the underachiever Dick (Todd Luiso). Rob's business isn't the only thing in his life that's floundering however, after after his longtime girlfriend Laura (Iben Hjejle) walks out on him. This forces him to examine his past failed attempts at romance.(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas.(n)

programme.title: The Truth About Lies
programme.desc: Gilby Smalls (Fran Kranz) is having a meltdown. He's just been fired from his job and his girlfriend gave him the boot. Forced to move in with May (Coleen Camp), his booze-swilling man-obsessed mother, he's desperate to turn things around. Gilby's luck seems to change when he meets Rachel (Odette Annable), the very thing Gilby needs to get his life back on track. Desperate to impress her, Gilby starts to weave a web of lies; one bigger than the next. Now in a sticky mess, Gilby is forced to face the uncomfortable truth about himself.(n)

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world.(n)

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: Writer, director and star Tyler Perry returns to his signature role in this comedy-drama that finds family matriarch Madea juggling several romantic crises involving her nieces' relationships as well as the funeral of an older sister - all on the weekend that her entire clan is gathering for a reunion. Cicely Tyson, Blair Underwood, Lynn Whitfield and Maya Angelou costar.(n)

programme.title: Father of the Bride
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee is a comedy of manners concerning a harried middle-class lawyer who frets over the work, expense and frenzy surrounding the engagement and wedding of his precious daughter. Spencer Tracy, in the title role, was nominated for Best Actor. The film spawned the 1951 sequel, "Father's Little Dividend," and was remade in 1991 with Steve Martin as the Dad. (cc).

programme.title: Father's Little Dividend
programme.desc: The sequel to "Father of the Bride" picks up with the newly married young lady giving birth to a boy, who screams his head off every time his grandfather comes near him. Spencer Tracy, Joan Bennett and Elizabeth Taylor reprise their roles from the original, with Vincente Minnelli once again doing the directing. (cc).

programme.title: Love Is Better Than Ever
programme.desc: Dance teacher Elizabeth Taylor pursues theatrical agent Larry Parks. Pleasant lightweight romance. Macaboy: Tom Tully. Mrs. Macaboy: Josephine Hutchinson. Directed by Stanley Donen. (cc).

programme.title: The Girl Who Had Everything
programme.desc: A successful lawyer tries to keep his daughter from falling in love with one of his clients, a handsome but dangerous man with criminal connections. A remake of 1931's "A Free Soul." (cc).

programme.title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
programme.desc: In post-World War II Paris, a reporter who wants to be a novelist marries an expatriate heiress, but her hedonistic lifestyle and his rejection letters lead him into a downward spiral. (cc).

programme.title: Rhapsody
programme.desc: A spoiled heiress becomes involved with both a violinist and a pianist. (cc).

programme.title: Tarzan Finds a Son!
programme.desc: Tarzan (Johnny Weissmuller) and Jane (Maureen O'Sullivan) vs. inheritance hunters (Ian Hunter, Frieda Inescort) out to snatch Boy (John Sheffield). Mrs. Richard Lansing: Laraine Day. Sir Thomas: Henry Stephenson. Richard Thorpe directed. (cc).

programme.title: Tarzan's Secret Treasure
programme.desc: The jungle lord's domain is invaded by explorers who attempt to appropriate his gold deposits. Johnny Weissmuller, Maureen O'Sullivan, Reginald Owen, Barry Fitzgerald, Johnny Sheffield, Tom Conway, Philip Dorn. Richard Thorpe directed. (cc).

programme.title: Tarzan's New York Adventure
programme.desc: Boy is snatched by a circus man, and Tarzan is off to rescue him in the Big Apple. (cc).

programme.title: Sky Murder
programme.desc: A detective (Walter Pidgeon) sets out to smash a spy ring. Bartholomew: Donald Meek. Pat: Karen Verne. Grand: Edward Ashley. Christine: Joyce Compton. Hendon: Tom Conway. Monrose: George Lessey. Kathe: Dorothy Tree. George B. Seitz directed.

programme.title: Big City Fantasy
programme.desc: Musical short follows a young lady from Hungary who arrives in New York City in search of her relatives and winds up wandering through various ethnic neighborhoods, backdropped by indigenous tunes. Phil Spitalny and His Orchestra perform a swing version of Liszt's Hungarian Rhapsody No. 2.

programme.title: A Yank on the Burma Road
programme.desc: A cabbie (Barry Nelson) supervises the driving of trucks over the Burma Road. Laraine Day, Stuart Crawford. Kim How: Keye Luke. Good action. George B. Seitz directed. (cc).

programme.title: Dark Delusion
programme.desc: Final entry in the "Dr. Gillespie" series has the physician and his aide working on the case of a seemingly insane girl.

programme.title: Rogue's March
programme.desc: English forces in 1890 India. Peter Lawford. Garron: Richard Greene. Jane: Janice Rule. Bielensen: John Abbott. Jersey: John Lupton. Crane: Michael Pate. Lenbridge: Leo G. Carroll. Allan Davis directed.

programme.title: The Wings of Eagles
programme.desc: A reckless World War I Naval aviator with a drinking problem becomes paralyzed after a fall, ending his military career. However, he becomes a respected screenwriter, and when World War II breaks out he finds a way to fight for his country again. (cc).

programme.title: Tarzan the Ape Man
programme.desc: Tarzan (Denny Miller) meets Jane (Joanna Barnes) in this cheesy remake of the 1932 jungle epic. Cesare Danova. Joseph M. Newman directed.

programme.title: Raintree County
programme.desc: A young Indiana poet and teacher falls in love with a beautiful Southern belle (Elizabeth Taylor in an Oscar-nominated performance), just as the Civil War descends and throws a wrench into their hope of a happy life together. (cc).

programme.title: Giant
programme.desc: Best Picture based on the Edna Ferber bestseller about Texas cattlemen, oil, troubled romances and racial injustice chronicles the lives of one proud family from the 1930s to the '50s. James Dean's final film; George Stevens won a Best Director Oscar. (cc).

programme.title: Grand Canyon, Pride of Creation
programme.desc: Arizona is visited in this entry in the "Traveltalk" series. Included: the Painted Desert; two views of the Grand Canyon (one from the rim and the other via a mule ride down a trail).

programme.title: Ivanhoe
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee set in the Middle Ages is a swashbuckling version of Sir Walter Scott's classic romance of star-crossed love that involves a dashing knight torn between a Saxon beauty and comely Jewish maiden. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Beau Brummel
programme.desc: Historical romance about the dandy (Stewart Granger) who introduced trousers to Regency England. (cc).

programme.title: Submarine D-1
programme.desc: Two sailors fight for a woman's affection on land and fight to keep alive when their submarine dies in deep waters.

programme.title: The Purchase Price
programme.desc: A cafe singer becomes a farmer's mail-order bride. (cc).

programme.title: The Old Maid
programme.desc: Exceptional film version of the Pulitzer Prize play about an unwed woman in the mid-19th century whose illegitimate daughter is raised as her cousin's child. (cc).

programme.title: Baby Face
programme.desc: Restored version of the provocative (in its day) melodrama starring Barbara Stanwyck as a strumpet who uses men as steppingstones to success in this variation of the rags-to-riches formula. George Brent, Donald Cook, John Wayne. Directed by Alfred E. Green. (cc).

programme.title: The Painted Veil
programme.desc: The neglected wife of a doctor immersed in his medical research has an affair with a British diplomat; but she chooses to go with her husband when he must travel to the interior of cholera-ridden China. (cc).

programme.title: The Great Lie
programme.desc: A socialite and a concert pianist compete for the affection of a playboy aviator, but do not meet until he goes missing while flying a mission for the government. (cc).

programme.title: In This Our Life
programme.desc: A neurotic Southerner steals her sister's husband and then tries to do it again when she starts dating another beau. (cc).

programme.title: 42nd Street
programme.desc: This musical comedy follows the last-minute challenges that ensue for a Broadway director on the opening night of his production after his leading lady twists her ankle the evening before the premiere. (cc).

programme.title: Butterfield 8
programme.desc: John O'Hara's story about the affairs of an amoral beauty won an Oscar for Elizabeth Taylor. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Sandpiper
programme.desc: Elizabeth Taylor and Richard Burton in a love story about a "free soul" artist. and a married minister who runs a private school that her troubled 9-year-old son has been court-ordered to attend. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Taming of the Shrew
programme.desc: Elizabeth Taylor and Richard Burton romp through this zesty Franco Zeffirelli production of Shakespeare's classic battle royal about an Italian maiden who may not marry until her older, ill-tempered, fiery sister finds a husband. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Doctor Faustus
programme.desc: A 16th century scholar sells his soul to the devil in exchange for gaining great knowledge and power for 24 years. Based on Christopher Marlowe's classic play "The Tragical History of the Life and Death of Doctor Faustus." (cc).(n)

programme.title: X, Y & Zee
programme.desc: Elizabeth Taylor and Michael Caine depict the relationship of a London couple, whose childless union is disrupted by an attractive widow (Susannah York). Brian G. Hutton directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Iron Mistress
programme.desc: An account of the life of American frontiersman Jim Bowie takes him to 1825 New Orleans, where he falls in love with a duplicitous Creole beauty, seeks his fortune in the lumber business, and engages in politics and duels of honor. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Go Getter
programme.desc: After losing a leg in the crash of the dirigible Macon, a man (George Brent) tries to succeed as a lumber salesman. Anita Louise. Cappy: Charles Winninger. Skinner: John Eldredge. Tinsdale: Henry O'Neill. Entertaining. Directed by Busby Berkeley. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Valley of the Giants
programme.desc: Story of the California redwood forests and the men who battled over them. Wayne Morris, Claire Trevor, Frank McHugh, Alan Hale, Donald Crisp. Morrell: Jack La Rue. Fats: El Brendel. Fallon: Charles Bickford. Hendricks: John Litel. Creel: Dick Purrell. McKenzie: Russell Simpson. Lorimer: Wade Boteler. William Keighley directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: God's Country and the Woman
programme.desc: Story of a lumber-camp manager (Beverly Roberts) and her nasty competitor (Robert Barrat). Steve: George Brent. Bullhead: Barton MacLane. Bjorn: Alan Hale. Red: Joseph King. Ole: El Brendel. Gaskett: Addison Richards. Good use of early Technicolor. (cc).(n)

programme.title: King of the Lumberjacks
programme.desc: A singer married to a lumberjack rekindles a relationship with an old flame, prompting the woman's current husband to place his wife and her lover on a runaway train. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Guns of the Timberland
programme.desc: In the 1895 Northwest, lumbermen and ranchers are at loggerheads and resort to blowing each other up over the former harvesting prime forest land that could impact the safety of the homes of the latter. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth Taylor An Intimate Portrait
programme.desc: A career-spanning documentary about Elizabeth Taylor that also includes interviews with family members as well as fellow actors who all attest to her all-around wonderfulness. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
programme.desc: Paul Newman and Elizabeth Taylor sizzle together in this Oscar-nominated Best Picture that adapts Tennessee Williams' Pulitzer-winning play about a smoldering wife (Taylor) who watches her bitter young husband (Newman) turn to the bottle. Newman, Taylor and director Richard Brooks also were nominated. Remade in 1976 and 1984. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: When a millionaire is convicted of fraud and sentenced to time in a maximum-security prison, he hires a man he assumes is an ex-con to coach him on surviving incarceration. Unrated version. (cc).

programme.title: The Hangover Part II

An Oscar went to director Jonathan Demme and also Ted Tally won for Best Adapted Screenplay for his script based on the Thomas Harris novel. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Incarnate
programme.desc: An unconventional exorcist must use his psychic abilities to do battle with a malevolent demon that has taken over an innocent 11-year-old boy. Later, he learns that the paranormal entity is also responsible for the deaths of his wife and child. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the popular video-game series, a death-row convict relives his ancestor's memories as an assassin in 15th-century Spain. From this out-of-body experience, he gains the training he needs to battle a conspiracy in the present day. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: A divorced boat builder discovers that his preteen son's stepdad is masking an evil side, forcing him to desperately try to protect his ex-wife and son from the new man in their lives. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Alien The Director's Cut
programme.desc: Bonus footage and a revamped soundtrack enhance this version of the Oscar-winning tale about an interstellar cargo ship terrorized by a monstrous stowaway. Suspenseful and terrifying. Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt. Directed by Ridley Scott. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Best Man
programme.desc: College friends reunite for a wedding, but the best man is nervous because his soon-to-be-published novel is based on secrets among his social circle—including a fling he once had with the bride. (cc).

programme.title: Almost Christmas
programme.desc: An African-American widower asks his family to join him for their first Christmas since his wife passed away. However, having all of them under one roof leads to a number of personal confrontations as secrets are revealed and marriages are tested. (cc).

programme.title: Strike Back
programme.desc: Lowry recruits Maya, a young jihadi, to test out the Novichok, and the team races to stop her before the gas is released on unsuspecting civilians. Meanwhile, Yuri, a brutal Borisovich hit man, is tasked with eliminating the members of Section 20. (cc).

programme.title: Mike Judge Presents: Tales From the Tour Bus
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. Waylon Jennings cheats death by giving up his seat on Buddy Holly's ill-fated plane trip in 1959, and later moves to Nashville, where he becomes roommates with Johnny Cash in the mid-1960s. (cc).

programme.title: The Nice Guys
programme.desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, a bumbling private eye and an enforcer-for-hire team up to find a missing woman with ties to the porn industry. In time, their sleuthing reveals a far-reaching conspiracy involving corruption in the federal government. (cc).

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: A somber vampire mesmerizes a young reporter with the story of his ghastly transformation from grieving aristocrat to immortal monster, beginning in 18th-century New Orleans with his first encounters with the charismatic and decadent bloodsucker Lestat. The two vamps remain deeply, if reluctantly, connected over the years, while becoming intimately involved with others of their kind, including a mature immortal in a young child's body. (cc).

programme.title: Tales from the Darkside The Movie
programme.desc: A mixed bag of three horror stories based on the works of Stephen King, Arthur Conan Doyle and Michael McDowall. Betty: Debbie Harry. Andy: Christian Slater. Halston: David Johansen. Drogan: William Hickey. Preston: James Remar. Carola: Rae Dawn Chong. Wyatt: Robert Klein. Bellingham: Steve Buscemi. Directed by John Harrison. (cc).

programme.title: The Cider House Rules
programme.desc: An orphan grows up under the tutelage of a kindly doctor in World War II Maine, where the young man refuses to assist his mentor with the illegal abortions that he performs in hopes of keeping the women from dangerous incompetents. Michael Caine won the Best Supporting Actor Oscar as the doctor. (cc).

programme.title: All the Real Girls
programme.desc: A small-town lothario (Paul Schneider) tries to change his ways when he falls in love with his best friend's 18-year-old sister (Zooey Deschanel). Slow paced, but well-acted. Patricia Clarkson. Directed by David Gordon Green. (cc).

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A math genius works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations. While being investigated by the Treasury Department, he agrees to help an accounting clerk look into fraud at her company, but the assignment will prove far more dangerous than he could have ever anticipated. (cc).

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: A hugely successful businesswoman is convicted of insider trading and sentenced to prison. After being released, she tries to earn redemption and revamp her public image by helping a group of young girls in their quest to sell brownies. (cc).

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: After witnessing her gangster boyfriend commit a murder, lounge singer Deloris evades capture and the police hide her in a convent. While adjusting to her new conditions, Deloris helps transform the choir, thus attracting a lot of attention. (cc).

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Two hard-partying ladies see a viral video in which unruly brothers plead for dates for their sister's wedding in Hawaii, and decide to pose as the angels they're looking for in order to score a free trip. (cc).

programme.title: The Truth About Charlie
programme.desc: A loose remake of the 1963 film "Charade," this romantic thriller focuses on a mysterious American who aids a Parisian who is menaced by crooks after her husband is killed. (cc).

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: The Coen brothers' sly drama about a policewoman (Frances McDormand) who's trying to determine how several murders and a kidnapping are linked to an unassuming car salesman (William H. Macy). Showalter: Steve Buscemi. Grimsrud: Peter Stormare. (cc).

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: A lifelong loser (William H. Macy), employed by a Las Vegas casino to stop gamblers' hot streaks, gets lucky in love. Deftly acted, well-written drama with Maria Bello and Alec Baldwin (Best Supporting Actor nominee). Directorial debut for co-screenwriter Wayne Kramer, who was nominated for a Grand Jury Prize at the Sundance Film Festival. (cc).

programme.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
programme.desc: A struggling actor and crook moves to Los Angeles, hoping to score some movie roles, where he meets a gay PI at a party. When a series of female bodies turn up, they find themselves investigating the murders. (cc).

programme.title: New Jack City
programme.desc: Streetwise cops target a megalomaniacal drug lord, whose empire is threatened by an informer. (cc).

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: A materialistic Manhattan bartender drops out of school to search for the perfect "rich chick" who will bankroll him into luxury. Later, the bottle-slinging barkeep finds his romance with a pretty waitress threatened by an alluring fashion executive who wants him all to herself. (cc).

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: A politician charges her aide with keeping her daughter in tow at a spring-break resort so that she does nothing to embarrass her family, or to jeopardize her mother's career. (cc).

programme.title: Class Action
programme.desc: Father and daughter lawyers (Gene Hackman, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio) become adversaries in a lawsuit against an auto company. Grazier: Colin Friels. Estelle: Joanna Merlin. Holbrook: Larry Fishburne. Quinn: Donald Moffat. Pavel: Jan Rubes. Brian: Jonathan Silverman. Directed by Michael Apted. (cc).

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes puts his strength and intellect to the test as he teams with Watson to battle Lord Blackwood, a formidable new adversary who is determined to destroy England. (cc).

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Now fully recovered from his amnesia, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail. (cc).

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Kevin Costner as an ex-Secret Service agent who falls for the pop diva (Whitney Houston) he's hired to protect. Despite the farfetched premise, the movie was a hit with audiences. The splendid soundtrack includes the hit song "I Will Always Love You." Written by Lawrence Kasdan, who penned the script in 1975 as a vehicle for Steve McQueen. Costner co-produced. (cc).

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A scientist discovers a catastrophic problem with Earth's core, and he and a team of experts embark on a dangerous mission to the middle of the planet in the hopes of averting a global disaster. (cc).

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: A reporter investigates a possible link between the CIA and the importing of cocaine into the U.S. in the 1980s. (cc).

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop (Jackie Chan) is transformed into a superhuman warrior by an all-powerful amulet. Chan's charm and physical antics compensate for the so-so plot. Chan also co-executive produced. Gordon Chan directed. (cc).

programme.title: State of Play
programme.desc: Adaptation of the British miniseries concerning suspicious events that set a rising congressman and a dogged reporter on a dangerous collision course. A U.S. congressman Stephen Collins is ascending the ladder of power, but his bid for the presidency hits the skids after his research assistant/mistress is viciously murdered. Now top reporter Cal McAffrey is eager to get the truth. But McAffrey has just walked into a major cover-up. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes puts his strength and intellect to the test as he teams with Watson to battle Lord Blackwood, a formidable new adversary who is determined to destroy England. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: Lowry recruits Maya, a young jihadi, to test out the Novichok, and the team races to stop her before the gas is released on unsuspecting civilians. Meanwhile, Yuri, a brutal Borisovich hit man, is tasked with eliminating the members of Section 20. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: In this sequel, Batman and idealistic DA Harvey Dent join forces to arrest and prosecute Gotham City's crime lords. But the deranged Joker raises the stakes by declaring all-out war on the forces of law and order. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Core

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Mystic River
programme.desc: Childhood friends Jimmy, Sean and Dave are reunited by a tragedy involving one of their children. As homicide detective Sean investigates, Jimmy enlists his relatives to launch their own inquiry. Later, suspicions fall on Jimmy and Sean's old friend Dave, who harbors some disturbing secrets. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Romeo Must Die
programme.desc: Violent take on “Romeo and Juliet” centering on the love affair between a Chinese escaped prisoner (Jet Li) and the daughter of the head of a black crime syndicate. The action packs a punch, but the script is packed with clichés. Pop star Aaliyah (1979-2001) costars and performs four songs on the soundtrack. Isaiah Washington. Andrzej Bartkowiak directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A team of mercenaries led by a former CIA operative is hired by the IRA to recover a mysterious briefcase before it's sold to Russian agents. Before long, the assignment turns into a deadly game of cat and mouse. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: Adaptation of the graphic novel set in 1985 America, where a cadre of forced-into-retirement superheroes investigate the murder of one of their own and uncover a wide-ranging conspiracy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Husband-and-wife paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren help a single mother living in 1977 London, who claims that she and her children are being terrorized by supernatural forces. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
programme.desc: Biopic about World War II Army medic Desmond Doss, a conscientious objector who refused to take a life or even carry a weapon. Doss was eventually awarded the Medal of Honor for saving the lives of 75 soldiers on the battlefields of Okinawa. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Human Stain
programme.desc: Well-acted but superficial adaptation of Philip Roth's novel about a light-skinned black college professor (Anthony Hopkins) who has been passing as white. Nicole Kidman, Ed Harris, Gary Sinise. Robert Benton directed. (cc).

programme.desc: Emmanuelle Vaugier and Ed Quinn star in this sequel that's based on the gory video game. This time, a secret government agency is called in to deal with zombies that have overrun a college campus. (cc).(n)

programme.title: U.S. Marshals
programme.desc: Sam Gerard is back chasing another wrongly accused fugitive. This time he's pursuing Mark Sheridan, a Chicago man framed for a double homicide in New York. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Dragon The Bruce Lee Story
programme.desc: Biopic of the legendary martial-arts master Bruce Lee. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Amelia

programme.title: Appaloosa
programme.desc: Two gunmen become the marshal and deputy of a lawless Old West mining town and take on a corrupt rancher (Jeremy Irons). Ed Harris directed and costars with Viggo Mortensen, Renée Zellweger and Lance Henriksen. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: A man who goes on the lam after he's wrongly convicted of killing his wife. As he scours the country looking for the true murderer, he is pursued be a relentless U.S. deputy marshal looking to bring him to justice. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, the illusionists known as the Four Horsemen return to perform a spectacular stunt in the hopes of clearing their names and exposing the unscrupulous behavior of a tech mogul. programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Three student filmmakers are terrorized in the Maryland forest while making a documentary about a legendary 18th-century witch. Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard and Michael Williams star. Directed by Eduardo Sanchez and Daniel Myrick. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore makes her directorial debut with this quirky sports drama about an ex-beauty queen (Ellen Page) who gives up her tiara for roller derby, to the dismay of her mother (Marcia Gay Harden). Kristen Wiig, Juliette Lewis. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Reno 911! Miami
programme.desc: The TV cops from Nevada travel to Florida for a police convention that is attacked by bioterrorists. (cc).(n)

programme.title: State of Play
programme.desc: Adaptation of the British miniseries concerning suspicious events that set a rising congressman and a dogged reporter on a dangerous collision course. A U.S. congressman Stephen Collins is ascending the ladder of power, but his bid for the presidency hits the skids after his research assistant/mistress is viciously murdered. Now top reporter Cal McAffrey is eager to get the truth. But McAffrey has just walked into a major cover-up. (cc).

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes puts his strength and intellect to the test as he teams with Watson to battle Lord Blackwood, a formidable new adversary who is determined to destroy England. (cc).

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A scientist discovers a catastrophic problem with Earth's core, and he and a team of experts embark on a dangerous mission to the middle of the planet in the hopes of averting a global disaster. (cc).

programme.title: CHIPS
programme.desc: A maverick motorbike racer reeling from a divorce and a California Highway Patrol cop who's secretly an FBI operative must overcome their personality mismatch and work together to uncover a major theft in this big-screen adaptation of the famous TV series from the 1970s and '80s. (cc).

programme.title: All About Steve
programme.desc: A quirky crossword-puzzle constructor falls for a cameraman and follows him across the country in hopes of winning his heart. (cc).

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
programme.desc: After a family tragedy, a boy named Jake follows a series of clues that lead him to a mysterious orphanage on a remote Welsh island. There, he discovers a community of children with unusual abilities, and learns he is destined to protect them. (cc).

programme.title: The Women
programme.desc: A sisterhood of well-to-do New Yorkers rally around their friend when they learn her husband is having an affair. Remake of the 1939 classic. (cc).

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: A man who goes on the lam after he's wrongly convicted of killing his wife. As he scours the country looking for the true murderer, he is pursued be a relentless U.S. deputy marshal looking to bring him to justice. (cc).

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: Gifted architect Sabine de Barra is hired to design a section of the elaborate landscaping at the Palace of Versailles for Louis XIV. The job brings with it gender and class barriers, and she also must contend with renowned landscaper André Le Notre, with whom she develops both a professional and romantic relationship. (cc).

programme.title: Driving Miss Daisy
programme.desc: A Southern matron forges a bond with her black chauffeur in the racially-divided 1960s South. Only when he is retired and she is confined to a home for the elderly do the two fully realize that they've been friends and kindred spirits all along. (cc).

programme.title: Lucky You
programme.desc: An aspiring lounge singer falls for a poker-playing stud in Las Vegas. (cc).

programme.title: Anywhere but Here
programme.desc: A flighty mother and her grounded daughter clash over the direction of their lives after leaving their drab Midwestern town for a more glamorous life in L.A. In time, a family tragedy forces both of them to grow up. (cc).

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Biopic about Virginian interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving, whose arrest in 1958 for violating the state's miscegenation laws eventually led to a landmark Supreme Court decision. (cc).

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: Two young boys execute the "perfect" murder, even pinning it on a local crook, but a detective with a disturbed past will not be outsmarted. The boys lie about knowing each other and cover their tracks, but a lack of trust could bring them down. (cc).

programme.title: Maps to the Stars
programme.desc: A high-powered Hollywood family unravel after their troubled daughter returns home, years after causing a fire that nearly killed her brother. Meanwhile, the daughter develops a relationship with a limo driver, and an aging actress pines for a role that she was born to play. (cc).

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A team of mercenaries led by a former CIA operative is hired by the IRA to recover a mysterious briefcase before it's sold to Russian agents. Before long, the assignment turns into a deadly game of cat and mouse. (cc).

programme.title: The Human Stain
programme.desc: Well-acted but superficial adaptation of Philip Roth's novel about a light-skinned black college professor (Anthony Hopkins) who has been passing as white. Nicole Kidman, Ed Harris, Gary Sinise. Robert Benton directed. (cc).

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Racial tensions grow in a Brooklyn neighborhood on the hottest day of the summer while everyone tries to cope with the heat. Spike Lee received an Oscar nomination for his screenplay. (cc).

programme.title: El Cantante
programme.desc: A great soundtrack spices up this profile of pioneering Latino salsa singer Hector Lavoe, who was popular in the 1960s, '70s and '80s. Marc Anthony stars as Lavoe and his at-the-time-wife, Jennifer Lopez, produced and costars as his spouse. (cc).

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Batman and Robin are called in as a last resort when the criminal masterminds of the millennium team up to conquer Gotham City by turning the U.N. Security Council into dust. (cc).

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: Thrilling adventure yarn about eight sled dogs struggling to survive when bad weather leaves them marooned at an Antarctic research post. The fact-based film is similar to the 1983 Japanese film "Nankyoku Monogatari," which was released in the U.S. as "Antarctica." (cc).

programme.title: Funny People
programme.desc: A struggling stand-up comic (Seth Rogen) befriends a movie star (Adam Sandler) who's dealing with a serious illness and trying to win back the love of his life. Eric Bana, Jason Schwartzman and Jonah Hill costar. Written and directed by Judd Apatow. (cc).

programme.title: Without a Trace
programme.desc: When her 6-year-old goes missing, a mother alerts the police and an investigation is quickly underway. After several fizzled leads, the mother and lead detective refuse to give up. Based on the novel "Still Missing" by Beth Gutcheon. (cc).

programme.title: Tales from the Darkside The Movie
programme.desc: A mixed bag of three horror stories based on the works of Stephen King, Arthur Conan Doyle and Michael McDowall. Betty: Debbie Harry. Andy: Christian Slater. Halston: David Johansen. Drogan: William Hickey. Preston: James Remar. Carola: Rae Dawn Chong. Wyatt: Robert Klein. Bellingham: Steve Buscemi. Directed by John Harrison. (cc).

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: Adaptation of the graphic novel set in 1985 America, where a cadre of forced-into-retirement superheroes investigate the murder of one of their own and uncover a wide-ranging conspiracy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Hard Candy
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl (Ellen Page) and a thirtysomething photographer (Patrick Wilson) connect in an on-line chat room and arrange a meeting in this creepily provocative psychodrama that turns into an unsettling tale of retribution. Sandra Oh, Jennifer Holmes. Directed by David Slade. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Raging Bull
programme.desc: Robert De Niro won a Best Actor Oscar as boxing champion Jake LaMotta, whose inner demons lead him to destroy the relationships he has with his brother and his second wife. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This biopic of literary editor Max Perkins centers on his personal and professional relationship with eccentric author Thomas Wolfe. As Wolfe becomes consumed with his lengthy novels, Perkins struggles to reel in his talent in order to deliver another best-seller for Scribner Publishing during the 1930s. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Rabbit Hole
programme.desc: Becca (Nicole Kidman) and her husband Howie (Aaron Eckhart) mourn the death of their 4-year-old son, who was hit by a car while chasing the family dog into the street. The couple attend group therapy, where Howie befriends another woman. Meanwhile, Becca forms a tentative friendship with the teenager who accidentally killed her son. Directed by John Cameron Mitchell. (cc).(n)

programme.title: A Perfect World
programme.desc: A Texas lawman pursues an escaped convict who has kidnapped a young boy. Meanwhile, in their dash to the border, the convict and the boy form a father-son attachment. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The English Patient
programme.desc: Nine Oscars, including Best Picture, went to this epic drama about an injured World War II cartographer who reveals his tempestuous affair with a colleague's wife to his caring nurse. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Playboy man-child Arthur learns that his wealthy mother will only give him his inheritance if he agrees to marry the daughter of a millionaire. However, Arthur hates his intended bride and instead falls for an unlicensed tour guide. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: A lonely writer falls for his computer's operating system, which has the voice of a woman and the ability to grow and learn. Their relationship quickly turns more intimate, but in time their differences begin to outweigh their similarities. Meanwhile, he struggles with a difficult divorce from his childhood sweetheart. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: A couple (John Cusack, Kate Beckinsale) decide to let fate determine if they are meant for each other. Charming but contrived essay about love and destiny. Eugene Levy steals scenes as an uptight salesman. Directed by Peter Chelsom. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Son-in-Law
programme.desc: A student invites her eccentric L.A. dorm counselor home to meet her conservative family at Thanksgiving. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: The Coen brothers' sly drama about a policewoman (Frances McDormand) who's trying to determine how several murders and a kidnapping are linked to an unassuming car salesman (William H. Macy). Showalter: Steve Buscemi. Grimsrud: Peter Stormare. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Dzień dobry
programme.desc: Poranne pasmo muzyczne, w którym prezentowane są najlepsze teledyski artystów cieszących się dużą popularnością.

programme.title: Hity na czasie
programme.desc: Zestawienie najpopularniejszych utworów muzycznych i teledysków, które znajdują się na szczytach różnych list przebojów.

programme.title: The best of ESKA
programme.desc: W magazynie prezentowane są najlepsze fragmenty programu radia Eska.

programme.title: Jazdy Gwiazdy
programme.desc: Gospodarz programu Filip "Rudy" Rudanacja zaprasza do swojego garbusa znane i lubiane gwiazdy show-biznesu. Podczas wspólnej przejażdżki nie zawaha się zapytać swojego gościa o wszystko, na co ma ochotę i co chcieliby usłyszeć widzowie.

programme.title: 10 hitów 1 po 2
programme.desc: Twórcy programu w każdym wydaniu prezentują 10 wybranych hitów. Utwory, będące największymi przebojami najsłynniejszych wykonawców, grane są jeden po drugim.

programme.title: Przesłuchanie
programme.desc: W każdym odcinku przesłuchiwana jest jedna z gwiazd show-biznesu. Twórcy programu zadają jej niewygodne pytania.

programme.title: Co się słucha?
programme.desc: Prowadzący sprawdzają, czego słuchają przypadkowo spotkani na ulicy ludzie.

programme.title: Ranking Jankesa
programme.desc: Krzysztof "Jankes" Jankowski przedstawia subiektywny ranking tego, co najlepsze w sieci, muzyce, świecie show-biznesu i wszystkich innych interesujących rzeczy, którymi dzieli się z widzami.(n)

programme.title: Eska Odwołuje Zimę 2018
programme.desc: Ekipa Radia ESKA, Ola Kot i Krzysztof "Jankes" Jankowski, wraz z największymi gwiazdami polskiej sceny muzycznej: Cleo, Afromental i Mesajah oraz grupą wybranych słuchaczy wybiera się na gorącą Jamajkę. Wspólnie będą zwiedzać rajską wyspę, poznawać lokalną kulturę, brać udział w zabawach, grach i konkursach. Podzielą się z widzami gorącą energią, tak by mogli oni poczuć wakacyjny klimat, a niskie temperatury i brak słońca poszły w zapomnienie. Nie zabraknie również egzotycznego koncertu w wykonaniu muzycznych gwiazd.(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.(n)

programme.title: Eska Odwołuje Zimę 2018
programme.desc: Ekipa Radia ESKA, Ola Kot i Krzysztof "Jankes" Jankowski, wraz z największymi gwiazdami polskiej sceny muzycznej: Cleo, Afromental i Mesajah oraz grupą wybranych słuchaczy wybiera się na gorącą Jamajkę. Wspólnie będą zwiedzać rajską wyspę, poznawać lokalną kulturę, brać udział w zabawach, grach i konkursach. Podzielą się z widzami gorącą energią, tak by mogli oni poczuć wakacyjny klimat, a niskie temperatury i brak słońca poszły w zapomnienie. Nie zabraknie również egzotycznego koncertu w wykonaniu muzycznych gwiazd.(n)

programme.title: Shaun the Sheep Movie

programme.title: Full House
programme.desc: Jesse is left to baby-sit Michelle and turns the chore into a rock gig replete with midnight sundaes and hair dyeing. Danny: Bob Saget. Joey: David Coulier. D.J.: Candace Cameron. Stephanie: Jodie Sweetin. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Full House
programme.desc: Stephanie's first-day-of-school jitters have Danny, Joey and Jesse playing superdad. Bob Saget, David Coulier, John Stamos. Mrs. Payton: Jackie Joseph. Kimmy: Andrea Barber. Stephanie: Jodie Sweetin. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Tiny T-Shirt
programme.desc: Mark asks out Rachel, who returns Ross's things; Monica still isn't attracted to millionaire Pete; Joey's irked by his costar in a play. Kate: Dina Meyer. Pete: Jon Favreau. Mark: Steven Eckholdt. Ross: David Schwimmer. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler's insincere "I'll call you" to Rachel's boss causes complications; Monica inherits a dollhouse; Joey and Kate get romantic. Joanna: Alison LaPlaca. Kate: Dina Meyer. Marshall: Reg Rogers. Lauren: Jennifer Milmore. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with a Chick. And a Duck
programme.desc: Ross helps an injured Rachel prepare for a business dinner, but doesn't tell her he's missing a chance to appear on TV; Pete (Jon Favreau) buys Monica a restaurant; Chandler and Joey adopt a baby chick. Ross: David Schwimmer. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel dates an angry young man (Ben Stiller); Joey and Kate (Dina Meyer) realize their true feelings for each other. Caitlin: Laura Cayouette. Marshall: Reg Rogers. Estelle: June Gable. Lauren: Jennifer Milmore. (repeat).

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie nurses an ailing Alan back to health so they can go on a double date with two sisters, one of whom Charlie's been wanting to date for a long time. Desiree: Johanna Black. Kathy: Lori Lively. Rose: Melanie Lynskey. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie's financial manager (Richard Lewis) informs the carefree jingle writer that he spends money faster than his royalty checks come in, and now he must go on a budget. Susan: Elena Lyons. Ted: J.D. Walsh. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.sub-title: Round One to the Hot Crazy Chick
programme.desc: Jenna Elfman plays a mysterious, slightly crazed woman whom Charlie invites to stay at the house until she can settle some family problems. Alan: Jon Cryer. Charlie: Charlie Sheen. Jake: Angus T. Jones. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie is perplexed when Frankie (Jenna Elfman), the mysterious woman temporarily living in the Harper household, begins falling for Alan and not him. Judith: Marin Hinkle. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: George Vows to Make Some Matri-Money
programme.desc: After belittling Angie's job as a wedding planner, George becomes one himself---taking on an impossibly demanding client (Eva Longoria) whom Angie dumped to show that anything she can do he can do better. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: George Discovers How Mescal-ed Up His Life Would Have Been Without Benny-Fits
programme.desc: After Benny berates him for not giving her a work prize she thinks she deserved, George dreams (with the aid of a spiked drink) that she's really a warm and caring mother---and that he's a mama's boy. It's anything but a wonderful life. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: Ernie tells George that the factory is moving to Mexico and that they'll both be out of jobs; Benny flees when she learns that the police want to question her about a robbery; a nauseated Angie awaits the results of a home-pregnancy test; Carmen is afraid to open her final college letter after three rejections; Max is tempted by beer; and Vic prepares to propose to a young woman he barely knows. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: George's House Has Two Empty Wombs
programme.desc: Angie claims that she's pregnant to keep George from missing Carmen, and Vic introduces his not-too-bright young fiancée (Stacy Keibler) to the family. (repeat) (cc).(c)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly wants to remodel their kitchen like the Kremps, but Murray isn't willing to do the makeover, and so Bev devises a plan to do the work herself and do it in a way that forces Mur to fix it. Except this scheme doesn't go as smoothly as expected. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly runs into trouble delivering on a promise to Barry and Erica, which she made in order to get closer to them. Meanwhile, Adam finds himself caught in a dilemma when he agrees to take both his best friend and his girlfriend to the school dance. (repeat) (cc).
